title: Mushroom pâté

ingredients.content: 300 g fresh mixed mushrooms, cut into halves (e.g. portobello, shiitake, oyster)
6 sprigs fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves only

preparations.content: Place oil, eschalots and garlic into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>, then cook <b>3 min/120°C/speed 2<b>.
Add all remaining ingredients, except walnuts, and cook <b>8 min/98°C/speed 2<b>.

Add walnuts and chop <b>1 min/speed 4<b>-9, increasing speed gradually from speed 4 speed 9<b> (see Tip). Transfer into serving dish and smooth top using spatula. Cover and allow to cool, place into refrigerator to chill (approx. 1 hour), then serve.

hintsAndTricks: For a chunkier pâté, blend <b>1 min/speed 4<b> (without increasing speed) after adding walnuts.
